body:
I recently joined the prestige club and i am so happy.
I have been striving for this goal for so long, and i want to thank a couple people for helping me out:  CheesyFeet12345 and Yaky.
Thank you all, and I'm on my way to prestige 2!

title: YAYA GOOD NEWS :D
